tips.tethered: Follower's elevation is kept in formation with their leader.
tips.offset: Follower's relative elevation compared to their leader is preserved.
tips.static: Follower's elevation is not affected by their leader. Useful for areas of effect or following a flying token.
tips.pulled: Follower shadows their leader's movements. Useful for riding vehicles or joining multiple tokens together.
tips.snap: Follower is snapped to grid during movements.
tips.nopause: Moving the follower token will not pause it from following their leader. Useful for riding vehicles.
tips.formation: Keep the follower in their relative position (e.g. <q>behind</q> or <q>in front</q>) as the leader moves. Select the direction your leader is moving or the direction the formation is facing.

collideWalls.name: Wall Collision Behavior
collideWalls.hint: Determines how a follower token will respond to a movement blocker along their path.

silentCollide.name: Suppress Collision Toasts
silentCollide.hint: Remove notification indicating a token you own has collided with a wall and stopped following its leader.

feedback.pickAsk: Please select the leader token for {followerName}
feedback.pickTarget: Please target (hotkey "t") the leader token for {followerName}
feedback.wallCollision: {tokenName}'s movement collides with a wall and has left formation.
